reviews.review:
Es uno de los primeros juegos de puzzle que revoluciono el mercado de su epoca o eso decian. Esa gente tenia razon, es un juego de Valve que se convierto en un clasico de la historia de los videojuegos. A pesar de sus años sigue siendo un juego jugable y encima tiene una historia por detras  que es original y bonita. Els bugs, esto es para los speedruners.

10/10

História - 8/10
Gráficos - 8/10
Jogabilidade - 9/10
Som - 8/10
Nota Final - 8.2/10
장점이라고 하면 참신한 시도와 높은 접근성에 있다. 이 게임은 스토리를 게임 진행 속에 깔끔하고 간단하게 녹여낸다. 이렇게 함으로써 플레이어를 자신의 강점인 소재와 퍼즐에 집중시킨다. 다만 이 게임의 퍼즐은 독특하고 참신하지만, 너무 쉽기도 하다. 반복되는 트릭이 많기에 사실 몇 개의 패턴과 기술만 알고 있다면 모든 스테이지를 손쉽게 클리어할 수 있다.
Valve, szóval nagyon jó

This inspired some amazing first-person puzzle games (including the sequel), and a bunch of memes obviously. If you're going back to play this for the first time, don't expect too much of the gameplay/puzzles. They're simplistic by modern standards. But the game is short enough it's still worth a play through, to see where it all started, plus the story moments are still lovely.

"Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing goes out."- GLaDOS
Portal

This game has very little wrong with it. The gameplay, level design, story and writing are sublime. This is a game that'll make you cry with laughter and fill with a sense of joy every time you complete one it's puzzles. The story is quite short but there are bonus and challenge maps and the story itself is one of the best gaming has to offer. I highly highly recommend this to anyone especially if it's on sale. I bought this for like 3 dollars and it was one of the best games I've ever played. There is no reason not to buy this masterpiece.
A classic and you cant go wrong with this classic
I love the concept of the game, and the story behind it!
Это шикарно, после прохождение этой части, посоветую пройти сразу вторую.
yes
Absolutely Phenomenal. Easily one of the best games on Steam

Portal is a game that makes you think differently about the game environment itself. Despite portals being so complex (especially for how simple they may sound) here, the game introduces them at a wonderful pace. I also liked how the story wasn't very intrusive to the gameplay. Along with that, the game still holds up, despite it being so old in 2020.

It's a outdated, neat, solid physics puzzle game. It was one of the first of its kind, and it's a fun game, but I beat it in 3 hours. It's really not worth much more than the $2 it goes on sale for every couple months.

Portal is a well-constructed masterpiece that is overwhelmingly positive. The game itself belongs in a museum. I definitely recommend this game to anyone who loves puzzle platformers, a rich story, adventure, and first-person experiences.

La saga portal me ha llegado al corazón. Me he emocionado con su historia, con las IAs, con los grafitis “del loco” contándome su propia historia. Son unos juegos que me han durado nada, los rompecabezas a los que me iba enfrentando me han parecido brillantes y desafiantes. Y la BSO que me ha ido acompañando durante los dos juegos, de las mejores que he tenido el placer de escuchar, sobretodo en los créditos, que son como en las buenas pelis de Marvel.
Ha sido una experiencia maravillosa haberlos jugado, y los rejugaré varias veces, porque segura estoy que me he dejado cosas en el interior de Aperture. Tengo la certeza que sus personajes tienen mucho que contarme aún.
Reseña completa en [url=https://lamazmorritacasioscura.wordpress.com/2020/08/05/jugando-a-portal-1-y-2/] [b] Jugando a: Portal [/b] [/url]
clasic game loved the game

Игра от Valve поставлена для решения интеллектуальных задач вашего мозга, перед тем как делать, стоит тщательно обдумать каждое действие. Выберитесь из тайной лаборатории Aperture путём решения головоломок.
Рекомендую к покупке.

I recently read a research paper which detailed how Portal was used as therapy for patients who had cognitive deficits from Multiple Sclerosis so I will be playing it much more often and hope that there are many more sequels to this game in the future.
